bloodbath.title: The Bloodbath
bloodbath.description: As the tributes stand on their podiums, the horn sounds.

feast.title: The Feast
feast.description: The Cornucopia is replenished with food, supplies, weapons, and memoirs from the tributes' families.

fatal.msg: {0.name} is unable to find shelter and dies.
{0.name} trips face first into a puddle of acidic rain.
{0.name} injures {1.name} and leaves {1.genA} in the rain to die.
{0.name} refuses {1.name} shelter, killing {1.genA}.
{0.name} shoves {1.name} into a pond of acidic rain, but is pulled in by {1.name}, killing them both.

arena.title: Arena Event: Poison Cloud
arena.description: A cloud of poisonous smoke starts to fill the arena.

fatal.msg: {0.name} is engulfed in the cloud of poisonous smoke.
{0.name} sacrifices {0.genS} so {1.name} can get away.
{0.name} slowly pushes {1.name} closer into the cloud until {1.genN} can't resist anymore.
{0.name} and {1.name} agree to die in the cloud together, but {0.name} pushes {1.name} in without warning.
{0.name} and {1.name} decide to run into the cloud together.

arena.title: Arena Event: Hurricane
arena.description: A monstrous hurricane wreaks havoc on the arena.

fatal.msg: {0.name} is sucked into the hurricane.
{0.name} is incapacitated by flying debris and dies.
{0.name} pushes {1.name} into an incoming boulder.
{0.name} stabs {1.name}, then pushes {1.genA} close enough for the hurricane to suck {1.genA} in.
{0.name} tries to save {1.name} from being sucked into the hurricane, only to be sucked in as well.

arena.title: Arena Event: Tracker Jacker Swarm
arena.description: A swarm of tracker jackers invades the arena.

fatal.msg: {0.name} is stung to death.
{0.name} slowly dies from the tracker jacker toxins.
{0.name} knocks {1.name} unconscious and leaves {1.genA} there as bait.
While running away from tracker jackers, {0.name} grabs {1.name} and throws {1.genA} to the ground.
{0.name} and {1.name} run out of places to run and are stung to death.

arena.title: Arena Event: Tsunami
arena.description: A tsunami rolls into the arena.

fatal.msg: {0.name} is swept away.
{0.name} fatally injures {0.genS} on debris.
{0.name} holds {1.name} underwater to drown.
{0.name} defeats {1.name}, but throws {1.genA} in the water to make sure {1.genN} dies.
{0.name} and {1.name} smash their heads together as the tsunami rolls in, leaving them both to drown.

arena.title: Arena Event: Fire
arena.description: A fire spreads throughout the arena.

fatal.msg: The fire catches up to {0.name}, killing {0.genA}.
A fireball strikes {0.name}, killing {0.genA}.
{0.name} kills {1.name} in order to utilize a body of water safely.
{0.name} falls to the ground, but kicks {1.name} hard enough to then push {2.genA} into the fire.
{0.name} and {1.name} fail to find a safe spot and suffocate.

arena.title: Arena Event: Border Shrink
arena.description: The arena's border begins to rapidly contract.

fatal.msg: {0.name} is electrocuted by the border.
{0.name} trips on a tree root and is unable to recover fast enough.
{0.name} restrains {1.name} to a tree and leaves {1.genA} to die.
{0.name} pushes {1.name} into the border while {1.genN} is not paying attention
Thinking they could escape, {0.name} and {1.name} attempt to run through the border together.
{0.name} dies from internal bleeding caused by a monkey mutt.
{0.name} is pummeled to the ground and killed by a troop of monkey mutts.
{0.name} uses {1.name} as a shield from the monkey mutts.
{0.name} injures {1.name} and leaves {1.genA} for the monkey mutts.
While running, {0.name} falls over and grabs {1.name} on the way down. The monkey mutts kill them.

arena.title: Arena Event: Carnivorous Squirrels
arena.description: Carnivorous squirrels start attacking the tributes.

fatal.msg: {0.name} is brutally attacked by a scurry of squirrels.
{0.name} tries to kill as many squirrels as {0.genN} can, but there are too many.
{0.name} uses the squirrels to {0.genG} advantage, shoving {1.name} into them.
{0.name}, in agony, kills {1.name} so {1.genN} does not have to be attacked by the squirrels.
The squirrels separate and kill {0.name} and {1.name}.

arena.title: Arena Event: Volcano
arena.description: A volcano erupts near the center of the arena.

fatal.msg: {0.name} is buried in ash.
{0.name} suffocates.
{0.name} pushes {1.name} in the lava.
{0.name} dips {0.genG} weapon in the lava and kills {1.name} with it.
As {0.name} trips over {1.name} into the lava, {0.genN} grabs {1.genA} and pulls {1.genA} down with {0.genA}.

arena.title: Arena Event: Total Darkness
arena.description: The arena turns pitch black and no one can see a thing.

fatal.msg: {0.name} trips on a rock and falls off a cliff.
{0.name} accidentally makes contact with spiny, lethal plant life.
{0.name} flails {0.genG} weapon around, accidentally killing {1.name}.
{0.name} finds and kills {1.name}, who was making too much noise.
While fighting, {0.name} and {1.name} lose their balance, roll down a jagged hillside, and die.

arena.title: Arena Event: Mass Hallucination
arena.description: The remaining tributes begin to hallucinate.

fatal.msg: {0.name} eats a scorpion, thinking it is a delicate dessert.
{0.name} hugs a tracker jacker nest, believing it is a pillow.
{0.name} mistakes {1.name} for a bear and kills {1.genA}.
{0.name} drowns {1.name}, who {0.genN} thought was a shark trying to eat {0.genA}.
{0.name} and {1.name} decide to jump down the rabbit hole to Wonderland, which turns out to be a pit of rocks.
